job_tasks.phrase: seamlessly integrate AI across both front-end and back-end systems
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core software engineering task of integrating AI capabilities into application architectures, spanning front-end and back-end development.

job_tasks.phrase: taking ownership of the entire product
job_tasks.justification: This implies responsibility for the full software development lifecycle, which is a key software engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: Architect and code sophisticated web applications that integrate both front-end and back-end components, with a focus on enhancing user experience through AI.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions architecting, coding, and integrating front-end and back-end components for web applications, which are core software development tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Work with cutting-edge AI technologies, specifically large language models (LLMs) like GPT-4 or Claude, to create autonomous tools and interactive features that redefine how students learn.
job_tasks.justification: Working with LLMs like GPT-4 or Claude to create tools and features is a core GenAI task, involving the development of applications using these models.

job_tasks.phrase: Drive Technical Projects: Take ownership of the entire development process, from gathering requirements to launching and iterating on products.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the end-to-end software development lifecycle management, a key software engineering responsibility.

job_tasks.phrase: work closely with stakeholders to ensure that our solutions meet learner needs
job_tasks.justification: This highlights understanding stakeholder/learner needs and aligning technical solutions with those needs.

job_tasks.phrase: applying the latest advancements in AI and web development to our platform.
job_tasks.justification: Applying advancements in AI and web development to a platform is a task related to evolving the software product.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop and deliver engaging, human-centered AI applications that demonstrably accelerate learning outcomes and efficiency for thousands of K-12 students.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the ultimate goal of developing and delivering AI applications, which is a software engineering output.

soft_skills.justification: 'Innovative thinkers' implies creativity and generating new ideas, aligning with innovation.

Collaborate and Communicate: Partner with a global team of developers, designers, and educational experts.

soft_skills.phrase: Your ability to communicate complex ideas simply and effectively will be key to your success.
soft_skills.justification: Explicitly mentions 'communicate complex ideas simply and effectively'.

soft_skills.phrase: Stay ahead of the curve by continually learning and applying the latest advancements in AI and web development to our platform.
soft_skills.justification: 'Continually learning and applying the latest advancements' directly maps to learning and adaptability.
'Human-centered' implies a focus on the user's needs and well-being, aligning with responsible AI development.

profile.rationale: The role requires a significant emphasis on traditional software engineering tasks (integrating AI into front-end/back-end, architecting, coding, driving projects) and explicitly involves working with GenAI technologies (LLMs like GPT-4, Claude) to create features. This balance of Macro-Category A and GenAI-specific Macro-Category B tasks, along with the specific technologies mentioned, aligns with the Core GenAI Engineer profile.
